translation.en: Remember, a woman must be selfish in a relationship.
translation.ja: 夫婦って 女がわがままでなきゃいけないの

translation.en: If you put your own happiness first, you'll do whatever it takes to make it last, right?
translation.ja: 自分の幸せが一番大事なら守るために何でもする

translation.en: But it can't be a relationship that destroys you.
translation.ja: ただし身を滅ぼさない結婚よ

translation.en: Remember that a woman who lives only for her man
translation.ja: 男のためだけに生きる女は必ず——

translation.en: And her man will be unhappy too.
Coffee for Dad. And for his daughter?
translation.ja: 父はコーヒー　娘は…
レモネード そうだ

translation.en: Sometimes I wish I was still that little girl you used to take out for lemonade.
translation.ja: パパからレモネードをもらってた子供に戻りたい

translation.en: You'll always be my little girl.
translation.ja: お前はいつまでも俺の子供だ

translation.en: I like spending time with you
because I can eat as much as I want and not feel guilty.
translation.ja: 罪悪感なしに食べられる

translation.en: There are two things you never point out to a woman.
translation.ja: 女性に言っちゃいけないこと

translation.en: Her age and the amount of food she eats.
I never knew about the second one.
-You should. -Okay, I'll keep that in mind.
translation.ja: 常識でしょ 覚えとくよ

translation.en: -Just a second. Olga won't stop calling. -Okay.
translation.ja: オルガにかけ直す ああ

translation.en: Hello. Answer my calls, or I'll have a heart attack.
translation.ja: 電話に出てよ　命が縮む

translation.en: You want to know what's up?
Massimo knows about everything, Lari. He knows about you and Nacho!
translation.ja: あんたとナチョのことマッシモが知ってる

translation.en: He's gonna kill you, me, and God knows who else!
translation.ja: あんたも私も殺される

translation.en: [whispering] No, I overheard him talking to Domenico.
translation.ja: ドメニコと話してるのを聞いたの

translation.en: Um, how did you know what they were talking about? You don't speak Italian.
translation.ja: イタリア語なのに話が分かったの？

translation.en: But I was pissed off about not understanding, so I learned.
translation.ja: 会話ができず悔しいから

translation.en: Maybe I'm not a fluent speaker, but I understand everything.
translation.ja: 話すのは苦手だけど理解はできる

translation.en: You know how to say, "Nacho fucked Laura"?
I guess it's time to go back to Sicily.
Are you fucking insane? He knows!
translation.ja: バカなの？ 知られたのよ

translation.en: Shoot! Fuck knows what he's gonna do!

translation.ja: 縁起でもないこと言った

translation.en: I'd rather him shoot himself than you or me.
translation.ja: 死ぬならあいつの方ね

translation.en: Olo, stop. There must be a reason he hasn't done anything about it yet.
translation.ja: 待って　彼がまだ言ってこない理由があるはず

translation.en: Are you even listening to me? Massimo won't forgive cheating.
translation.ja: ちゃんと聞いてる？マッシモは不貞を許さない

translation.en: I'm not scared of my own husband. I won't hide from him.
translation.ja: 私は夫を怖がって逃げたりしない

translation.en: Do what you want. I'm working on… an escape plan.
translation.ja: 勝手にして 私は脱出計画を練っておく

translation.ja: タバコ吸って 落ち着いて

translation.ja: 言われなくても吸い続けてる

translation.en: Dad, I have to go back to Sicily.
But first, let's go back to the table. I ordered some apple pie.
translation.ja: だが パイを頼んだからそれが先だ

translation.en: what did you not understand when I told you not to push me?
translation.ja: 待ってと言ったはずだけど

translation.en: by coming here, I'm risking my life and also my father's life in business.
translation.ja: 自分の命も 父の信用も危険にさらしてここに来た

translation.en: We have a pact with Massimo not to enter his territory.
translation.ja: 縄張りに入らないと協定がある

translation.en: because I needed to see you.
Hear me out, and then do what you want.
translation.ja: 話を聞いてから決めてくれ

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Fabio Rossi. Let's go.
translation.ja: いいわ 運転手さん　出して

translation.en: You know the address. You used to work there as a gardener.
translation.ja: 住所は知ってるでしょ庭師だったから

translation.en: You wanted to tell me something.
I want to be honest with you.
I understand what it means to be best friends with your lover.
translation.ja: 君は恋人であり親友なんだ

translation.en: I didn't fall in love with you at first sight.
I came to like you first.
translation.ja: まず 好意を持った

translation.en: For the way you get angry… the way you squint your eyes.
translation.ja: 怒り方とか目の細め方とかが気に入った

translation.en: When you smile without a reason. [chuckles]
I wanna discover new things with you. I wanna show you the sunrise in Burma.
translation.ja: 君と新しい発見をしたいビルマで朝日を見たい

translation.en: I wanna meditate with you in Bali.
And get drunk with you in Tokyo.
I know it sounds silly, but…
I have no idea when you became my world, Laura.
translation.ja: いつの間にか君が世界になった

translation.en: I can't live without this world, and I don't want to.
translation.ja: その世界がないと俺は生きられない

translation.en: I don't know how to convince you.
I'm ready to give you everything.
Thank you for finding the courage to tell me all of this.
translation.ja: 勇気を出してくれてありがとう

translation.en: But I also need to speak with Massimo.
I can't stay in that situation anymore.
translation.ja: 今の状況は耐えられない

translation.en: Okay. I packed just one suitcase.
translation.ja: スーツケースは１個にした

translation.en: I grabbed your stuff too. It'll be a quick escape.
translation.ja: ２人分入れて 逃げやすくね

translation.en: Why the fuck didn't you call or text?
translation.ja: なんで連絡しないのよ

translation.en: I would've sent a driver for you.

translation.ja: 運転手が すごくいい人よ

translation.en: Are you serious? Now's not the best time--
translation.ja: こんな時に 何言ってるのよ

translation.en: Have you forgotten your husband's line of work? [inhales sharply]
Why don't you bring him with you,
and I'll look up how to send a dead body back to Poland?
translation.ja: 私は遺体の運搬方法検索しとく

translation.en: [in Polish] God, it's so sad. You're going to die on your birthday.

おめでとう ラウラ

translation.ja: プレゼントのバッグは

translation.ja: 会ってくるね 本当に？

translation.en: We need to work things out.
And when I get back, we'll drink to my resurrection, okay?
translation.ja: 戻ったら 私の復活に乾杯ね

translation.en: -I'm doing this alone. -Oh yeah, alone. I'll stay here and wait.
translation.ja: １人で 分かった　ここで待ってる

translation.en: Lari will be okay on her own.
This conversation will be much more difficult for me.
translation.ja: 俺の方がしづらい話だ

translation.en: I have to say it all now.
Otherwise, I'm afraid I'm never gonna be able to say it again.
translation.ja: 二度と言えないかもしれない
あの時 俺は変わった

translation.en: Not only because I had you,
but also because I realized what I really want for myself.
translation.ja: 自分が欲しいものが分かったからだ

that you didn't feel to come to me anymore after losing our baby.
translation.ja: 子供を亡くしても俺に言えなかったこと

So you knew everything about Nacho for a long time, didn't you?
translation.ja: ナチョのことずっと知ってたのね

translation.ja: 子供の頃父が読んでくれた

translation.en: I still remember one sentence, a little parable.
translation.ja: 「星の王子様」の１節を覚えてる

translation.en: I didn't really understand it back then.
translation.ja: 当時は意味が分からなかったが…

translation.en: "If it comes back, it's yours forever."
translation.ja: “戻ってくれば永遠に自分のもの”

translation.en: it was never meant to be."
